mapper.sql: account_id, recommender_id, login_name, status, create_date, pause_date, close_date, real_name, idcard_no, birthdate, gender, occupation, telephone, email, emailaddress, zipcode, qq, last_login_time, last_login_ip, login_passwd, column_21
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM account
AND idcard_no like CONCAT('%',#{idcardNo},'%')
AND real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
AND login_name like CONCAT('%',#{loginName},'%')
AND status = #{status}
limit #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into account (account_id, recommender_id, login_name, status, create_date, pause_date, close_date, real_name, idcard_no, birthdate, gender, occupation, telephone, email, emailaddress, zipcode, qq, last_login_time, last_login_ip, login_passwd, column_21 ) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommenderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pauseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column21,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update account
recommender_id = #{recommenderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pause_date = #{pauseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
close_date = #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_no = #{idcardNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthdate = #{birthdate,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emailaddress = #{emailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

column_21 = #{column21,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE account SET status = #{status},
pause_date = null
pause_date = now()
close_date = now()
where account_id = #{accountId}
